projects.title: Leetcode Microservices
projects.description: A production-ready LeetCode-style coding platform built using a complete microservices architecture. Features isolated code execution inside Docker containers, API Gateway routing, inter-service communication, real-time WebSockets, secure authentication, PostgreSQL + Prisma ORM, Redis caching, distributed queues, and advanced DevOps tooling including Prometheus, Grafana, Loki, Docker Compose, and GitHub Actions CI/CD.

projects.title: Graphing Calculator for Complex Functions
projects.description: I've been working on a tool designed to make graphing and analyzing complex functions easier and more intuitive. This advanced graphing calculator features vector fields for detailed function analysis and domain coloring to visualize complex functions in a unique way.

projects.title: CsTimer - Rubik's Cube Timer
projects.description: This web app is a clone of a rubik's cube timer app with full auth features such as reset password and confirmation email.It is a highly interactive web app with lots of features such as scrambles for different puzzle types 3x3,2x2,4x4 up to 7x7.It also has charts to show your progess of your solve times.
